lBwaQ2WnCJBkXgaMF4W-eA.text: Great food and fast delivery- there was an extra dish in the bag, but so tasty we didn't mind the bump in price :)

photos.caption: Photo of Shanaz - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

UDI7BpcJHJEdKnCr7w_ccg.text: This tiny wee place is might be the best Indian take away in Stockbridge. Service is fast, despite the tiny open to all kitchen. Top pick is the Katmandu Murgh - a wee change if you, like me, feel ashamed ordering the awesome Chicken Tikka Masala every week.

aSZ8WRkaPXsdNU517_OKdQ.text: A great Indian takeaway on the main street in Stockbridge. Friendly, well priced and very tasty. The Chicken Jahlfrezi is recommended - but remember to take the chillies out if you don't want overkill heat!! The cooking is done right in front of you in the open plan kitchen which is good to watch while you wait.

loH8gKlNDd67ENa9a66h7A.text: Definitely Stockbridge's best Indian take away -- staff are always lovely and friendly and it's great to be able to see the food being made so you know exactly what the hygiene of the kitchen is like! My partner has a nut allergy and the staff have always been willing to advise on what he can and cannot have. The chicken bhuna is particularly good. Great place!
